name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David A. REITHMAYER, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David A. REITHMAYER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: James P. Fox, Norristown, for appellant.
Ronald T. Williamson, Chief, Appeals Div., Robert A. Selig, Asst. Dist. Attys., J. William Ditter, III, Norristown, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
453 A.2d 335
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David A. REITHMAYER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 6, 1982.
Decided Dec. 29, 1982.
James P. Fox, Norristown, for appellant.
Ronald T. Williamson, Chief, Appeals Div., Robert A. Selig, Asst. Dist. Attys., J. William Ditter, III, Norristown, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
